pages.text: Steel jewelry is a base set of jewelry for the more powerful $(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/imbued_jewelry)Imbued Jewelry$(). Steel Jewelry offers a modest armor bonus, stacking with each piece worn. There are four pieces of base jewelry:$(li)$(#b0b)Steel Headband$()$(li)$(#b0b)Steel Amulet$()$(li)$(#b0b)Steel Ring$()$(li)$(#b0b)Steel Ward$() (Usable as a shield)
